TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ControlCollection implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 Office 解决方案中 Excel 工作表中的托管控件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of managed controls on an Excel worksheet in an Office solution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的方法和属性的接口来管理 Excel 工作表上的控件。Use the methods and properties of the interface to manage controls on an Excel worksheet. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). 无法在代码中，创建此接口的实例，因为它不具有任何公共构造函数。You cannot create an instance of this interface in your code, because it does not have any public constructors. 若要获取在文档级项目中的此接口的实例，请使用之一的属性`Sheet` *n*项目中的类。To get an instance of this interface in a document-level project, use the property of one of the `Sheet`*n* classes in your project. 若要获取在文档级项目中的此接口的实例，请使用属性的在运行时以编程方式创建宿主项。To get an instance of this interface in a document-level project, use the property of a host item that you create programmatically at run time. 有关更多信息，请参见 [在运行时在 VSTO 外接程序中扩展 Word 文档和 Excel 工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). 下表显示了如何使用成员来执行一些常见的任务与文档上的控件。The following table shows how to use members to perform some common tasks related to controls on documents. |任务Task|操作Action| |----------|------------| |将控件添加到工作表。Add a control to the worksheet.|使用添加之一*\<控制 >* 方法。Use one of the Add*\* methods. 例如，若要添加，使用方法。For example, to add a , use the method.| |从工作表中移除的控件。Remove a control from the worksheet.|使用 方法。Use the method.| |确定控件是否在集合中。Determine whether a control is in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |获取集合中的控件的索引。Get the index of a control in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |从集合中获取一个控件。Get a control from the collection.|传递的索引或名称，该控件的属性。Pass the index or name of the control to the property.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可添加控件添加到末尾。The method enables you to add controls to the end of the . 若要删除之前以编程方式添加的控件，请使用方法。To remove a control that was previously added programmatically, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将插入到的单元格的数字 16 **E1**通过**E3** ，向单元格将数字 24 **F1**通过**F3**。The following code example inserts the number 16 to cells **E1** through **E3** and the number 24 to cells **F1** through **F3**. 该代码随后创建控件的单元格**A1**通过**C8** ，并将传递的单元格**E1**通过**F3**到方法来填充图表的数据。The code then creates a control to cells **A1** through **C8** and passes cells **E1** through **F3** to the method to populate the chart with data. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#58](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/CS/Sheet1.cs#58)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#58](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/VB/Sheet1.vb#58)]

span.span: Multi-area ranges cannot be used.

exception.span: 该范围应与 实例同在一个工作表中。

span.span: The range should be on the same worksheet as the instance.

param.span: 要添加到 实例的控件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于任何控件添加到在运行时。This method can be used to add any control to the at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个自定义用户控件添加到工作表使用`AddControl`方法。The following code example adds two custom user controls to the worksheet using the `AddControl` method. 第一个控件添加到单元格区域。The first control is added to a range of cells. 第二个控件添加到特定位置。The second control is added to a specific location. 代码更改属性的第一个自定义用户控件，仅将控件移动相对于，其中包含工作表上的控件。The code changes the property of the first custom user control, which only moves the control relative to the that contains the control on the worksheet. 代码随后设置的属性返回的第二个的用户控件，用于说明设置的正确方法控件的属性。The code then sets the property of the returned by the second user control to illustrate the correct way to set the property of the control. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/CS/Sheet1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelControlCollection#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelControlCollection/VB/Sheet1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中直接调用此方法。You should not call this method directly from your code. 改为调用扩展方法来获取 Visual Studio 。Instead, call the extension method to obtain a Visual Studio . 扩展方法使用此方法来生成 Visual Studio对应的本机实例。The extension method uses this method to generate a Visual Studio that corresponds to an instance of a native . 扩展方法创建扩展仅一次。The extension method creates an extended only once. 它在后续调用中返回同一实例的现有扩展的对象。It returns the same instance of the existing extended object in subsequent calls. 与此相反，创建一个新扩展每次。In contrast, creates a new extended each time.

MemberSignature.Value: public object this[string name] { get; }
.property instance object Item(string)

param.name: name
param.span: 表示控件名称的字符串。

span.span: The string that represents the name of the control.

summary.span: 获取具有指定名称的控件。

span.span: Gets the control with the specified name.
The control with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关以编程方式添加控件`name`参数应包含为添加的最后一个参数指定的名称*\<控制 >* 方法，不`Name`控件的属性。For controls that you add programmatically, the `name` parameter should contain the name that you specify as the last parameter of the Add*\* method, not the `Name` property of the control. 在设计时添加的控件的`name`参数应包含标识符。For controls that you add at design time, the `name` parameter should contain the identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Remove (object control);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 要从 实例中移除的控件。

span.span: The control to be removed from the instance.

summary.span: 从 实例中移除指定的控件。

span.span: Removes the specified control from the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时添加的控件不能删除从实例。Controls that are added at design time cannot be removed from the instance. 您只能使用方法中删除在运行时添加的控件。You can only use the method to remove controls added at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时添加的控件不能删除从实例。Controls that were added at design time cannot be removed from the instance. 您只能使用方法中删除在运行时添加的控件。You can only use the method to remove controls added at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加控件和一个到工作表中的控件。The following code example adds a control and a control to the worksheet. 单击按钮时，代码将删除控件。When the button is clicked, the code removes the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时添加的控件不能删除从实例。Controls that were added at design time cannot be removed from the instance. 您只能使用方法中删除在运行时添加的控件。You can only use the method to remove controls added at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加控件和一个到工作表中的控件。The following code example adds a control and a control to the worksheet. 单击按钮时，代码将删除由索引指定的控件。When the button is clicked, the code removes the control specified by the index. summary.span: 确定指定的控件是否为 实例的成员。

span.span: Determines whether the specified control is a member of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以确定控件是否是集合，然后再尝试对控件执行操作的成员。This method enables you to determine whether a control is a member of the collection before attempting to perform operations on the control. 可以使用此方法以确认控件已添加到或仍是的成员实例。You can use this method to confirm that a control has been added to, or is still a member of, the instance.
